name: STRANGERS WORLD: THE SWARM
detailed_description:
Strangers World: The Swarm is a cooperative VR shooter. There are many missions awaiting you, from exploring infected laboratories to dark caves, surviving swarms of monsters, crafting your weapons from modules, rescuing scientists, returning data to many other activities.

You start the game as an operative of a special organization that monitors the spread of alien flora and fauna, invading our world due to a historic event.
By completing tasks and improving various equipment, you must restrain the influx of monsters, in order to regain control of our planet and save humanity.

Alone, with an assistant drone, or together with friends, you will have to take on this fight. Create weapons from resources, pick up tools and gear whilst finding your own style of play. Play solo and complete levels in stealth mode or if prefer to become a beast and destroy everything in your path. However you choose to proceed be prepared, as the creatures are listening carefully and they will come to greet you and your team and it might not be friendly.

Game features:
- Cooperative for up to 4 people
- Modular weapons
- Various tasks and locations
- Beautiful, futuristic graphics
- Three classes of soldiers, each with a unique style of play
- A unique world full of bloodthirsty monsters
- Nostalgia of the 80s mixed with science fiction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Oculus Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9900K or AMD Ryzen 7 3900X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3080 or AMD Radeon RX 6900XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Oculus Quest 2

content_descriptors.notes: The game features violence against aliens, mutants, zombies, and other non-humans.
